casebody.data:
WILLIAM H. LUTTON COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. LORD & BURNHAM COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 2, 1927. No. 310. Grant C. Rox and John K. MacDonald, both of New York City, for appellant. Russell M. Everett and Harry B. Rook, both of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON and SWAN, Circuit Judges, and CAMPBELL, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (16 F.[2d] 490) affirmed, with costs.
